programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: GLORY 100 features four GLORY world title bouts, four separate four-man one-night tournaments to determine who qualifies for the Last Heavyweight Standing finals, and several key matchups involving some of GLORYâ€™s most popular fighters.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: Over the course of a year, twelve of the best GLORY featherweights will compete opposite twelve of the best RISE featherweights in a series of knockout bouts until one fighter becomes the Last Featherweight Standing.

programme.title: K1
programme.desc: Final Elimination tournament for the top sixteen Heavyweigh fighters. The winners qualified for the K-1 World GP 2007 Final.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.desc: 3 wins to come out on top, who's it going to be? Rico Verhoeven, Levi Rigters, Tarik Osaro, Benjamin Adegbuyi, Sofian Laidouni, Uku Jurjendal, Bahram Rajabzadeh, and Nabil Khachab pair up and throw down for the GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix, an 8-man 1-night heavyweight tournament for the ages.
